entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM CST Friday 10 February 2023
